posts.post_content: I have the following SGC T-206 cards for sale all prices are shipped either Paypal + 3%, Paypal money owed or money orders are fine also. I am selling roughly half of collection and will be posting others in small bunches soon. Thanks for looking. Dennis.                                                                                               Rhodes SGC 30-Piedmont 350- $30  Stanage SGC 30- Polar Bear -$30.
